content.title: Making Plans for book 5
content.creator:
Dianne Gardner
February 16, 2025
content.content:
We've had a slight hiccup in the funding and the first stretch goal has not been met because of it. I haven't written the short story yet, but I will most likely write it anyway.  We still have 17 days left in the campaign. 
I am really sorry about not being able to offer the hardcover to my European customers. I'm going to look into ways that would make it possible, so if you are in Europe, and you have purchased the other books of this series, please stay in contact and I'll see what I can do. The best way to do that is to join one of my email lists. 
Part of the problem is that other printers who do offer GPSR assistance, do not have leather binding. If any of you are aware of a printer who does and has a representative for GPSR distribution, please let me know. 
Book 5 of this set is titled The Keeper. I'm not sure when I will be launching the limited leather edition of this book. Because I'm in the Beta program for the Kickstarter Pledge Over Time, and I'm not sure how that program is going to work, I decided to hold off that next campaign for a little while. 
If I do that, I may have book 6 Another Man's Storm ready and can offer the two together. I'm halfway done with it and have been keeping subscribers up to date on it's process on Substack.
Again, I thank you all so much for your support and for reading these works.

content.title: First Stretch Goal Unlocked!
content.creator:
Dianne Gardner
February 14, 2025
content.content:
The first stretch goal has been unlocked!
That's right! I've been commissioned to write Barin and Anna's courtship story. It's an interesting relationship, and the short story will whisper of what might come in Darkness Holds the Son. 
That puts us on course for the next stretch goal.
$6500 will get us some PDF artwork and word art that you can print or use as screen savers. I'll post some samples in the next day or so. 
I'm really hoping we get to the $8,000 level because then I can afford colored illustrations in the hardcover book and eBooks. 
In the meantime, check out these other campaigns by my creator friends.

content.title: Dedication Edition Added
content.creator:
Dianne Gardner
February 13, 2025
content.content:
Two quick updates for you for Darkness Holds the Son.
I've added a Dedication Hardcover tier. This book will not only have your name in the acknowledgments, but it will also have the dedication of the book to you or someone you choose. I will also hand write a personalized note to you. There is only 1 of these available, of course, as I can only insert one dedication page. The cost is $200.
I've added another stretch goal. If we reach $8,000 I'll be able to make the illustrations in the book color. So tell your friends, send them a link, ask them to pledge. I would love to do this.
Be looking for some digital word art for stretch goals as the campaign goes on. We're almost to the first stretch goal for that short story.
Have a great rest of the day.

content.title: I want to thank every one of you!
content.creator:
Dianne Gardner
February 12, 2025
content.content:
Thank you so much for your support for Darkness Holds the Son and for the Cho Nisi series as a whole. I see so many of you coming back and getting all the books! it's thrilling and I hope you are enjoying the story. 
If you see anything missing please message me and I'll try to accommodate your wishes. 
I have a lot of swag that's accumulated during these last campaigns and I'm considering putting some extras that I have in the add-ons so let me know if you'd be interested in: There wouldn't be enough for stretch goals, but I can put them as add-ons with limited supplies.
Beasts and Oddities of the Cho Nisi World saddle stitch book.
Escapades of a Magic Thief (short story that goes with my the Ian's Realm Saga).
Gold foil bookmarks of each book in the series, plus bookmarks for Tales of Wonder, Thread of a Spider, and An Unconventional Mr. Peadlebody. 
If you've joined me at SubStack, you'll know I'm in the process of writing book 6 to the Sword of Cho Nisi series and I'd love for you to take the Name the Dragon poll. 
Again, you've been the best backers ever. We're now close to $5,000 on the first day. We funded in 7 minutes. So I'm thrilled with the team and stay tuned as I conjure up an extra reward for you for being so faithful.  I'm thinking something along the lines of a short story...?
